content: this whimsical hat is the perfect accessory for fall and beyond a quick and rewarding knit that uses magpie domestic worsted to achieve great stitch definition this hat is named after nirvana s song pennyroyal tea when i designed it i had a name all picked out but after a recent trip to seattle i fell madly in love with the city and knew that my first pattern had to be named with a nod to the nineties that i hold near and dear charted and written instructions included
